title: Applying a filter on a Join dataset in chart editor's select data page does not refresh the data preview
description:
When applying a filter on a Join dataset in the chart editor's select data page, the data preview part does not refresh.
To reproduce:
1. Open the attached file.
2. Click on a filter with row["Data Set1::EMPLOYEEID"] = 1.
Actual result: After applying the filter, the data preview remains unchanged even though the filter has an effect.
Expected result: The data preview should refresh after applying a filter.
OB: The data preview in the chart editor's select data page should refresh after applying a filter on a Join dataset.
EB: The data preview in the chart editor's select data page is not being refreshed after applying a filter on a Join dataset.
SR: Ensure that the data preview in the chart editor's select data page refreshes correctly after applying a filter on a Join dataset.
